caption.p: WGCNA of genes showing large expression variance in sepsis patients. ( A) Network heatmap of unsupervised cluster analysis of module genes. Different colors in columns and rows represent different modules. ( B) Correlation of modules with clinical traits. Each column represents a different module; each row, a different clinical phenotype. Red indicates positive correlation; blue, negative correlation. ( C) Progressive up- or down-regulation in a module in the trend: healthy controls < sepsis < sepsis shock.
